about_the_game:
Game World

In a realm teetering on chaos, a disordered human army makes its last stand by the merciless sea, the relentless onslaught of the Half Dead Legions nipping at their heels. These horrific creatures, devoid of will, battle scars shrouded beneath heavy armor, pledge blind obedience to their ruthless commander. The only thing that drives them is a ceaseless hatred for all that live.


Main Features


  • Strategize for survival: Analyze your battlefield and adopt varied survival strategies. Prioritize technological advancement or population growth, strike early to exploit your enemy’s weaknesses or expand and fortify your territory, and beyond!!
  • Prepare before battle: Direct hundreds of workers in building settlements and establishing supply chains to support your forces.
  • Recruit diverse troops: Deploy thousands of soldiers, harnessing the unique abilities of each soldier type for maximum advantage.
  • Wield medieval artillery: Take control of formidable long-ranged weaponry from the Middle Ages.
  • Effortless army control: Multiple options to manage large army sections with ease, reducing the need for micromanaging individual soldiers.

Campaign

Embark on a monumental mission to fortify human resistance and rekindle hope amidst imminent annihilation. As the underdogs in this struggle, your journey won’t be easy!


The single-player campaign offers a diversified mission roster, featuring:

  • Defend your bastion: Bolster your stronghold and withstand massive sieges.
  • Craft covert operations: Set deadly ambushes and leverage the element of surprise.
  • Hold the line: Control crucial territories for required durations.
  • Diversionary tactics: Utilize a fraction of your forces and resources to draw significant enemy attention.
  • Strike at will: Unleash all-out assaults on weakened enemy frontlines.
The game features innovative mechanics, making for a unique RTS experience. For hardcore players, advanced modes provide more unconventional mechanics and challenges for an intensified battlefield scenario.

name: Four Hundred Catapults

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.2Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5 3Ghz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A large-scale survival strategy game with up to 3000 units on the battlefield. Build and manage your settlement, produce resources, research weapons and technologies, and recruit your army to survive in the war against the Half Dead Legions.
